languages.text: "Утверждение... потенциально истинно. Протоколы кибермастифа сложны для взлома и изменения, тем более..." {n}Паскаль обводит окружение тоскливым взглядом.{/n} "...в подобной примитивной культуре".

"This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение... потенциально истинно. Протоколы кибермастифа сложны для взлома и изменения, тем более..." {n}Паскаль обводит окружение тоскливым взглядом.{/n} "...в подобной примитивной культуре".

"This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

languages.text: “这种说法……有可能是真的。生化獒犬的安全协议很难被破坏、篡改，更不用说……”{n}帕斯卡面色阴沉地打量着周围的一切。{/n}“是在如此原始的文明之中。”
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法……有可能是真的。生化獒犬的安全协议很难被破坏、篡改，更不用说……”{n}帕斯卡面色阴沉地打量着周围的一切。{/n}“是在如此原始的文明之中。”

languages.text: «Esta declaración... es potencialmente verdadera. Los protocolos de un cibermastín son difíciles de vulnerar y anular, sobre todo...». {n}Pasqal mira en derredor con expresión sombría.{/n} «Para una cultura tan primitiva como esta».
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración... es potencialmente verdadera. Los protocolos de un cibermastín son difíciles de vulnerar y anular, sobre todo...». {n}Pasqal mira en derredor con expresión sombría.{/n} «Para una cultura tan primitiva como esta».

languages.text: "Bu ifade... Potansiyel olarak doğru. Siber mastif protokollerini ihlal etmek ve geçersiz kılmak zordur, hele ki..." {n}Pasqal, kasvetle etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Böylesi ilkel bir kültürde."
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ifade... Potansiyel olarak doğru. Siber mastif protokollerini ihlal etmek ve geçersiz kılmak zordur, hele ki..." {n}Pasqal, kasvetle etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Böylesi ilkel bir kültürde."

languages.text: 「この説明は…本当の可能性がある。サイバーマスチフのプロトコルは、破られたり、上書きすることが難しい、このような…」{n}パスカルは悲観的な様子で周囲を見渡す。{/n}「このような未開の社会では」
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: 「この説明は…本当の可能性がある。サイバーマスチフのプロトコルは、破られたり、上書きすることが難しい、このような…」{n}パスカルは悲観的な様子で周囲を見渡す。{/n}「このような未開の社会では」

languages.text: « Cette affirmation... est potentiellement vraie. Les protocoles des cyber-mastiffs sont très difficiles à contourner, et encore moins... » {n}Pasqal marque une pause appuyée en regardant autour de lui d'un air sombre.{/n} « ... par une culture aussi primitive. »
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation... est potentiellement vraie. Les protocoles des cyber-mastiffs sont très difficiles à contourner, et encore moins... » {n}Pasqal marque une pause appuyée en regardant autour de lui d'un air sombre.{/n} « ... par une culture aussi primitive. »

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ... ist potenziell wahr. Cyber-Mastiff-Protokolle sind schwer zu überbrücken, erst recht nicht ..." {n}Pasqal mustert missmutig seine Umgebung.{/n} "Von einer derart primitiven Kultur."
languages.original_text: "This statement... is potentially true. Cyber-mastiff protocols are difficult to breach and override, much less..." {n}Pasqal casts a gloomy look at his surroundings.{/n} "In a primitive culture such as this."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ... ist potenziell wahr. Cyber-Mastiff-Protokolle sind schwer zu überbrücken, erst recht nicht ..." {n}Pasqal mustert missmutig seine Umgebung.{/n} "Von einer derart primitiven Kultur."
